name: Resume
body:
## Objective
 
Currently in a stage of personal development as an engineer, focusing my career towards information technology and communications field. 
Worked in various engineering fields such as telecommunications, mechanical design or chemical and materials laboratories.
Devote part of my free time learning new programming languages and agile methodologies work.

## Summary

My career has led me to specialize increasingly in the management of various projects. I have experience in: strategic planning forward, that operate within tight financial disciplines imposed by ambitious budgets which I have helped plan the orderly administration of deadlines, and application of flexible working methods (through motivation staff and participation in both decision making and goal setting, clarity in communication and easy personal relations). My cosmopolitan experience and interests have allowed me to develop my listening skills and problem solving in the course of projects.

## Skills

* Time-efficient, systematic working methodologies.
* Rapid adaptability to new problem-solving and new locations
* Use of agile methodologies, time reporting and project planning.
* Operating systems: Linux, Windows
* Programming languages: c#, javascript, php, python
* Frameworks: .NET, Drupal, FatFree Framework,  angularJS
* Javascript libraries: jQuery, knockout

## Work history

CBG Konsult: System Developer in R&D department. Research, design and develop integration systems for clients and partners.

DIOPMA (2010-2011): center design and optimization of processes and materials as a researcher.

AASIT SL (2007-2010): Telecommunications company as a system developer in streaming technologies.

## Personal projects

https://galindus.github.com/babyfeeding

Technical reviewer for new tizen cookbook: http://www.packtpub.com/tizen-cookbook/book

http://www.gardaimport.com
http://www.lemporium.com
